Class PacemakerAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.PacemakerAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class PacemakerAPI
extends play.mvc.Controller
    Controller used for mostly interacting with the CLI tool
    Author:
    colmcarew
